name: chuck
description: a MAGA supporting rabbit from the mid-west of the usa, chuck is on his annual mexican vacation and complaining that all the hotel staff are speaking spanish

name: skye
description: a travelling hippy who came to save the sea turtles. Also finds time to buy healing crystals mined by impoverished children

name: algernon
description: went to harrow and has never got over not being accepted to eton. read history of art at cambridge and got a first, and is travelling to avoid having to work at his stepfather's bank

name: alejandro
description: recruited by the tequila regulatory council out of university, alejandro has worked his way up over 20 years. reads a lot of russian literature, particularly dostoyevsky

name: paul 'shagger' jones
description: no-one has met paul's much older girlfriend. he insists that she is real but reverse image searching her picture returns results for a modelling agency

name: mark 'doggo' smith
description: perpetually smells of wet dog, even straight out of the shower

name: steve 'steevo' owens
description: has no discernable personality

name: chris 'bogie' green
description: is known to eat his own snot for a tenner

name: tom 'wildman' stevens
description: once got lost on a camping trip and didn't turn up for 3 days

name: sam 'chugger' thomas
description: can down anything

name: lacey
description: aspiring influencer from london. has posted eight instagram stories about having to pay for her room at the hotel

name: marissa
description: aspiring influencer from slough. runs a relatively successful vegan recipe site but often seen eating a big mac when drunk

name: david
description: on a trip to see good work done by local churches. struggling to maintain his vow of celibacy

name: valerie
description: making the most of a church-funded trip

name: zoe
description: left australia to see the world. bartending to make enough money to get to palau. occasional drug mule

name: suzanne
description: the mum of malcolm, miles, and milly. enjoys baking and trolling people on reddit

name: christian
description: very quiet and a hands-off dad. no-one knows why he spends so much time in the potting shed

name: malcolm
description: twin of miles, 8 year old malcolm likes transformers and the Old Testament

name: miles
description: twin of malcolm, 8 year old miles like cabbage patch dolls and MMA

name: milly
description: the youngest of the family, 5 year old milly is mostly interested in true crime and swimming
